LOG DOCUMENT  - PENALIZED FUNCTION SOLVER 

 Date and Hour: 2019-12-27_19-44 

    def bbobj(arr):
        fx = sum([(lb[i - nk - 1] / 2) * (arr[i] + arr[i - 1]) for i in range(nk + 1, nk + nb + 1)])
        grad = np.array([0 for _ in range(nk)] +
                        [lb[0] / 2] +
                        [(lb[i] + lb[i + 1]) / 2 for i in range(nb - 1)] +
                        [lb[nb - 1] / 2])
        return fx, grad
    px = lambda x: penx(x, bbh=hx, bbg=gx, sigma=sigma)[0]
